newsitem.title: UK: RESEARCH ALERT - Mediaset raised at Lehman.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Mediaset raised at Lehman.

text.p: Italian media group Mediaset was raised to "outperform" from "neutral" at Lehman Brothers, the investment bank said on Friday.
In a research note, Lehman analyst Carlo Campomagnani said the move followed the Italian Senate's approval of a new broadcasting bill which cleared regulatory concerns overhanging Mediaset shares.

Lehman said the bill did not impose an absolute 30 percent cap on market share and was also more lax than feared on the number of channels Mediaset can control and on the amount of advertising that can be shown.
The investment bank put a target valuation of 8,600 lire on Mediaset's core domestic TV activities.
